sections.heading: Creation of Office of Administrative Hearings Within the Department of Natural Resources and Transfer of Authority to Make Decisions Regarding Administrative Appeals of Surface Water Discharge Permit Applications From the Commission of Natural Resources to the Office of Administrative Hearings
